full_sentence: Brainwashed are gonna destroy themselves by the truth damn.

We need some form of eugenics to prevent our race from degrading. So I don't agree with you. We should take care of our people? True but if we have too many people to take care of and not enough people and resources to take care of them, it becomes a problem. The resources could be used on other things like advancing society and scientific endeavors. We don't have to force eugenics on people but we should definitely have a system of rewards to encourage people with good genes to procreate and people with undesirable traits not to procreate.
